mapper.select: select g.id as id, g.goods_name as goodsName, g.goods_easy_desc as goodsEasyDesc, g.goods_unit as goodsUnit, g.goods_price as goodsPrice, g.goods_img as goodsImg, c.`name` as communityName, u.`name` as storeName from `community_goods` cg left join `goods` g on cg.`goods_id` = g.`id` left join `community` c on cg.`community_id` = c.`id` left join `user` u on g.`goods_store_id` = u.`user_id` where cg.`community_id` = #{communityId}

select g.id as id, g.goods_name as goodsName, g.goods_easy_desc as goodsEasyDesc, g.goods_unit as goodsUnit, g.goods_price as goodsPrice, g.goods_img as goodsImg, u.`name` as storeName from `goods` g left join `user` u on g.`goods_store_id` = u.`user_id`

select g.`goods_name` as goodsName, sum(oi.`goods_num`) as goodsSale, sum(oi.`goods_price` * oi.`goods_num`) as goodsMoney from `order` o left join `order_item` oi on o.`id` = oi.`order_id` left join `goods` g on g.`id` = oi.`goods_id` where o.`store_id` = #{storeId} and o.`create_time` like concat(#{date},'%') group by g.`goods_name`

select g.`goods_name` as goodsName, sum(oi.`goods_num`) as goodsSale, sum(oi.`goods_price` * oi.`goods_num`) as goodsMoney from `order` o left join `order_item` oi on o.`id` = oi.`order_id` left join `goods` g on g.`id` = oi.`goods_id` where o.`store_id` = #{storeId} and o.`create_time` > #{date} group by g.`goods_name`
